title: Global Chip Shortage
context: High demand for ARM-based processors (Raspberry Pi) may lead to 12+ week lead times.
mitigation: Pre-order critical compute modules immediately (Week 2). Validate alternative hardware.

title: Camera Fogging
context: The fridge interior is cold and humid. Opening the door causes condensation.
mitigation: Integrate hydrophobic coating on lens glass. Design placement away from vents.

title: AI Model Accuracy < 90%
context: YOLOv8 may struggle with occluded items or poor lighting.
mitigation: Collect a custom dataset with 'messy fridge' scenarios. Implement multi-frame tracking.
